description:
To survive his battle with Monet, Zoro must overcome his unwillingness to cut a woman. Elsewhere, Luffy puts a hungry dragon on his back and tries to punch his way out of the basement!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ougi Sakuretsu! Zoro Saikyou no Ittou-ryuu!
Showing Off His Techniques! Zoro`s Formidable One-Sword Style!
Une nouvelle arcane. L’incroyable technique à un sabre de Zoro !
Взрыв секретной техники! Сильнейший одномечевой стиль Зоро!
奥義炸裂! ゾロ最強の一刀流!
